content:
<ce:section-title>Preparation of compound <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>
</ce:section-title><ce:para view="all">A mixture of PbO (44.6<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>L (22.4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), NH<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>NCS (15.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.2<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (18<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) were placed in a 25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL Teflon-lined steel vessel and heated to 140<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 5 days, then cooled to room temperature. The resulting colorless block-shaped crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> were washed several times by water and diethyl ether. The yield is 45% based on Pb. Elemental analysis (%) calcd for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>: C 12.19%, H 0.77%, N 14.21%; found: C 12.01%, H 0.81%, N 14.29%.</ce:para>
clean_text:
Preparation of compound 1 

A mixture of PbO (44.6mg, 0.2mmol), H2L (22.4mg, 0.2mmol), NH4NCS (15.2mg, 0.2mmol) and H2O (18mL) were placed in a 25mL Teflon-lined steel vessel and heated to 140°C for 5 days, then cooled to room temperature. The resulting colorless block-shaped crystals of 1 were washed several times by water and diethyl ether. The yield is 45% based on Pb. Elemental analysis (%) calcd for 1: C 12.19%, H 0.77%, N 14.21%; found: C 12.01%, H 0.81%, N 14.29%.
